backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and note management with access control and CRUD operations for notes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented UI and OCR features to source files and components with test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens and dark mode theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, profile setup gating, and rendering the scanner UI.
frontend/src/components/LoginGate.tsx: Login screen with Internet Identity authentication and feature overview.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their name via backend API.
frontend/src/components/StudyScannerScre: Main scanner UI handling camera feed, automated OCR capture, text filtering, similarity detection, and note CRUD.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handlers, and initializes AuthClient with persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: React-query hooks to fetch, create, and delete notes through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving the caller’s user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/ocr.ts: Mock OCR utility that simulates text extraction with preset sample results.
frontend/src/utils/similarity.ts: Implements Levenshtein-based normalized string similarity scoring.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, typography, containers, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature definitions, and architectural notes for a camera‑based OCR study assistant app. Describes the automated capture loop, change detection, UI components, and saved‑capture management.
